about_the_game:
EggChickenFarm is a casual idle simulation game centered around nurturing baby chickens and collecting different chicken species in your chicken catalog.

Hatching and Growing

Start your journey with an ordinary egg! Care for each little chick, watching them grow from nothing into beautiful chickens. Provide them with delicious food and a comfortable environment to help them thrive.

Breeding and Management

Using the breeding house, you can select the best pairs of chickens to produce new eggs and chicks. Each breeding session has the potential to create unique new species, so come and complete your chicken catalog! Gradually expand your farming scale, manage resources wisely, sell fresh eggs to earn coins, upgrade facilities, and purchase more content and decorations.

Dressing Up Chickens and the Farm

Give your chickens adorable hats and change their styles to showcase their unique personalities! You can also adjust the farm scenery to alter the appearance of your space at any time. Create a warm and unique farm that stands out!
